content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke, walking around some, when i turned around towards the west and immediately noticed a "classic" triangle flying in a normal commercial route to the st. louis airport over south st. louis (when the flights are landing from the west to east). it was initially the relative size of a golf ball at a 45 degree angle, southwest, in the clear sky. it was clearly an isosceles triangle of white lights, but all looked perfectly round and none were blinking. there was a red blinking light in the middle of the triangle. it made no discernible sound, even when there as there little ambient traffic noise when i can normally can hear a commercial plane as well as see it taking that route. after observing the lights/object for about 5 seconds, the front light shut off! i see many planes who's front landing lights slowly become less visible as it passes by my house getting closer to the airport, but this front light definitely shut off. i could not see a structure, only lights, that appeared to be on a flying craft changing orientation as it was flying by. the normal commercial route is straight as they are flying as they pass my house until i can't see them through trees to the west anymore. tonight the craft banked left as it neared the point i usually can't see the planes continue in their straight course. the "roundness" and size of the white lights, the front light shutting off (while approaching an airport for a landing!), then veering away from the airport all prompted me to make this report of an unidentified flying object, but yet i would "identify" it as a "triangle ufo". i did not notice any other commercial planes on that route this evening.
content.summary: Triangle flies commercial route over south st. louis towards airport then veers away

content.detailedDescription:
While travelling in a bus on a sunny morning at 10 am, i start to look around for my stop.  that���s when i notice a white cigar shaped object hovering, completely still as was the bus due to a red light.  i am certain that the canadian airforce does not operate any harrier jets so quickly i realize that this thing it not of this earth.  the object also had a black stripe with an altitude of aprox. 500-1000 ft. there it hovered for about 10 seconds before suddenly taking off towards lake ontario (sw) at a speed that no man made will currently accomplish in our atmosphere.  strangely, the object maintained its ��� whiteness ��� while speeding and i could easily make out the craft until it was merely a white spot in the distance.  disappointed that i didn���t have a camera as i had an excellent view of it. 

it truly is amazing to witness a thing like this in broad daylight in canada���s largest city.  this country intends to spend over $50 billion on its defense budget over the next decade or so to fight wars in distant parts of this world with fancy equipment.  yet, absolutely nothing is done when an ufo is hovering over toronto in the middle of the day.  as an adult and a citizen of this world i simply demand answers to what this is.  how can something like this travel into canadian airspace without being detected by canadian authorities?  where do they come from?  why are they here?  perhaps it would be wise to stop chase the taliban for a while now and turn your attention to more important matters at home.  to think that people are some clueless cattle is unacceptable.  this internal ignorance has got to stop.
content.summary: While travelling in a bus i notice a white cigar shaped object hovering completely still.  it had a black stripe with an altitude of aprox. 500-1000 ft. there it hovered for about 10 seconds before suddenly taking off towards lake ontario (sw)..

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio at about 8 pm facing west when a quiet, brightly glowing disc shaped craft suddenly appeared at approximately 5,000 - 10,000 feet 10 miles east of dresden nuclear power plant. it flew west over dresden and passed a military jet which was about 2 miles south of the object and several thousand feet higher. the disc was moving about twice as fast as the military jet and continued west towards the horizon. it would have been impossible for anyone looking at the sky in that direction to have missed it as the object was very bright, very fast, made no sound and left no contrail.
content.summary: Bright glowing disc appeared & then flew west over dresden nuclear power plant & continued west past military plane which was heading east

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside on the front patio, when someone looked up and said "what is that?" and we all looked up to see this bright orange fireball travelling very quickly across the sky. the fireball did not lose altitude or speed as it flew across the sky. we were able to see it until it traveled out of sight. a few of us insist the object seemed to simply vanish while some of us think it flew beyond distance of our sight. it appeared to gain some altitude as it went along. there was no sound we could hear, and there was no diminishing of the color or brightness, and no apparent trail behind it. it was flying lower than a plane would, and we live fairly close to the airport.
content.summary: Orange fireball travelling fast across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the back yard with his star like object past over head from north to south.
content.summary: Star like object passed over head

content.detailedDescription:
Backyard, filling bird feeders., came back inside pool screen, and sat down by pool, saw a cylinder like probe, approx. 16" long, from 3/4 to 1" in diam. 3" from both ends. oval wings at 45 degree angle, clear. aprox. about 5". color- copper/bronze. stationary, 5 1/2 ft above ground. no lights, no noise. flight charcateritics meterializm out of nowhere. right outside pool gage aproppx. 1ft away from sceen. it seemed to be observing plants inside pool cage(parsely,basil, and organo, etc),dematerialized from sight and appeared again 3 screen spaces over for aprox. 4 sec. again appearing to be observing foleage. and then just disappeared. all this took aprox. 8 secs.

i was amazed at the sighting, and informed my spouse of what she just missed seeing.
content.summary: Apprx. 16" cylinder, rounded at both ends, 3/4 to 1" in diam. copper/bronze, 2 sets of wings.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were outside, smoking a cigarette before i left to go home. it was about between 1230am and 1am. we both were noticing how the stars were more clear than usual because we've had a lot of rain as of late. i looked to the north sky, and pointed out the first object drifting across the sky. then the second one came, what was a star, or i thought before was following the first one. i just stared at it and then the second one disappeared first. then the first one kept going for a good 1 and then was gone too. i was like "omg finally we saw ufos!!" my boyfriend brings me back to earth usually and says, "what if it was a satellite?" it couldn't of been, it just couldn't of. why would the second one show up and disappear first while the other one kept going? i wish it would stayed out later. i don't live near a swamp but i do live near dfw/lovefield airports. nothing these lights were anything close to the lear jets or commercial jets. i've seen satellites and those stupid fire lanterns, these were nothing like it. it was amazing.
content.summary: 2 lights. one started first then the other followed and the 2nd disappeared first..Then a few minutes later the first one disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the same object that i did the last two nights on a different flight path then before and vanished the same exact way. a bluish white light that was moving very fast and vanished.
content.summary: Same object as last 2 nights

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: 2 friends and myself went out for a ride to go do a spot of fishing. we knew of this nice quiet place about 20 or so miles from town.We got there,unloaded the vehicle,got a small camp fire going and my friend's girlfriend who did not fish that night made a coment on how nice the scenery was and how all the stars seem to light up.Well dark came and as we were packing up our poles we decided to just hang out for awhile and admire the view when we all seen these 3 lights in the sky that resembeled a triangle ,these lights did not blink but there were other lights on this craft that did blink.We viewed this event for about 5 minutes until we could not see it anymore.What ever it was sure was pretty.
content.summary: Triangle

content.detailedDescription: Starting around the night of june 6th, 2012 i have been seeing unexplainable objects in the sky above and near my neighborhood. it started when me and another person were walking our dogs. it was a windy tuesday night with no clouds in the sky. we were walking down a dark road when a bright flickering light caught my eye. at first i dismissed it as a star, but when we continued walking the intensity of the light began to change and then it started moving! i quickly pointed it out to the person i was with and she could not explain it either. i have seen my fair share of satellites and this was not one. we live fairly close to the fresno airport and i have never seen a plane or helicopter behave in this manner and even then, their was no sound coming from it!Once it started moving it was going about 3x the average speed of a plane and headed ne towards the mountains. but the sightings dont stop there. i work outdoors during the day, i was standing near an intersection observing a jet passing over leaving behind a contrail when out of nowhere i am almost blinded by a metallic egg shaped object that appeared probly 700ft over the intersection. at first i though it was glare from the sun on my sunglasses. i moved my head and glasses around a bit, thinking my eyes were playing tricks on me. but this object was just hovering in the same position. it looked like it was emitting alot of light from it. it felt like i was staring at a mini sun. it was hoving for a good 10 seconds and then as quick as it appeared, it was gone. for the next 2 nights i saw the same star-like object as the night before, heading in the same direction, with no sound coming from it, moving againts the heavy gusts of wind. after that the sightings stopped for 3 days. then i started seeing the same star-like object almost every other night. in the past 2 weeks i have probly seen it  about 10 times, at varying distances, ranging in movement from hovering, to a very fast straight path, to high speed precision turns. the wierdest recent sighting took place with the person who saw the first one with me.  we saw the same bright light, make what i can only describe as a rollar coaster motion as it swooped down then arched back upwards and disappeared above the neighborhood not 500ft from us. we determined this thing to be about the size of a small bus. i havent noticed any missing time recently but ever since these sighting began i havent been able to recall a single dream i have had, which is wierd as i normally vividly remember my dreams. a couple mornings i have woken up and been very sore and achy all over, i also noticed a rash like burn that almost looked like a finger tip on the direct center of my chest which was not there when i fell asleep that night. i dont think i was abducted, just thought i would note the strange occurances that have been going on since this started. sadly i dont have much money right now and have no access to a camcorder, and my flip phones crappy camera dosnt get me very far. i havent really told anyone about these sightings other than the person who has seen some with me, i think most of my friends would just laught me off as a kook! the activity has again quited down for the last couple of days, will be sure to report if i see anything more.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple orb sightings in clovis, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back  yard having a smoke about 8.45 pm i saw was a craft round in size.  come over the east mountains it came towards me  it was lower then helcopters usally fly.  the disc like ufo was  probley 100 ft away from me.  it then stopped and hovered above me.  no sound then this  orange light came on and expanded it looked like  dimples in the lighting.  i called out to  my son in law but he didnt come then i ran to the front door and told him to come outside and see this  ran back to  the back yard.  its still there. my son in law didnt come so i ran to front door and told him to come see. ran back  out  it was still right ther above me.  but the hugh orange lite was smaller.  my son in law came out to see finnaly he said how weird, the  orange like smaller. then it went out and  a bubble white light came  on it appeared to be like it was in a  cloud.  a circle  cloud and it was in the middle of the cloud. it went north then at a very slow pace.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came slowly over tne  mountain then stopped in air.  hovered then  hugh orange light expanded  look like  dimples in  the light .  tryed to get my son in law to wittness took  him about  7 mins to come as it hovered.  it was  still hoverring when  he saw

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 10:30pm, i noticed the pulsating stars lining up and flashing more prominently last night, just like the first time i observed the orange orb(last week.) so i went to the front of my house to look for the orange orb that i saw there previously and less than a minute later i saw the solid, orange, glowing, non-blinking ball traveling west to east again. however, this time i noticed it hover a second and slightly adjust path from it straight line and then descend below the tree-line and out of view. 
at 10:58pm , i was back in my back yard and noticed a bright flash of light in a constellation that was low in the southeastern sky. the week before i observed a dark object traveling through the sky and then flashing when it hit the handle of the big dipper constellation.
content.summary: Another solid orange orb flying west to east

content.detailedDescription:
Several teenage friends and i were sleeping outside in the backyard of where i lived at the time in blackwell,ok.We saw three disc,light gold colored,objects flying from east to west very high in the night sky,the objects were flying in a vee formation and moving at a very high rate of speed.Movement of the objects is what caught our attention.Total time of our seeing the ufo's was about 1 minute.My feeling at the time was of surprise.
we discussed the event among our selves and were to excited to sleep much that long ago summer night.I never saw ufo's before or after that sighting.
all of us saw the same disc shaped,gold colored objects.
content.summary: Three very fast saucers flying in triangle formation,east to west;high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife answered a phone call from a neighbour regarding lights in the sky. she went out on the front porch then called me out to see. i saw a brilliant orange ball in the sky moving from sse to nnw. it travelled consistently at about 1000 ft above ground and at an estmated speed of 500 to 600 kmph.

then another appeared approximately three seconds behind the first, then a cluster of six, and then several more, all about evenly spaced on the same track and velocity as the first one i saw. as they approached over the ottawa river in the vanier to parliament hill area, they simply dimmed and faded away.

at least 2 neighbours saw them, but there has been no indication of it being reported or otherwise identified anywhere (news, web, radio).
content.summary: Several round orange balls moving across sky then faded to nothing.

content.detailedDescription: It moved in a straight line.No visable lights on outside,bright orange around outside darker in the center like a doughnut.
content.summary: Thought it was a falling star was not.Bright orange doughnut shaped dark center

content.detailedDescription:
Well back in 1991/92 i lived in boones creek tn.  it was early summer and around 2 or 3 am.
i was in bed and i was suddenly wide awake...I jumped out of bed and coming threw my window was the purest white blue light i have ever seen. it was pulling away from the yard. i ran to the back door and went to the fence to see what it was but it was on the other side of the large tree that was in the yard..It was like everything was bathed in a soft yellow light.
the dog was just laying there unresponsive..I hollered at it and it didn't budge..I went into the house and everyone sleeping wouldn't wake up..I then returned to my room and sat there till morning, i asked everyone about it and they thought i was crazy. after that for three years i hard horrible headaches. i saw several doctors and none could explain it..Then they just stopped. i have tried to talk to people about it but i am often looked at as if i lost my mind. i figure that this is my last chance to tell this and hope that no one laughs at me.
thanks 
mw
content.summary: Possible abduction

content.detailedDescription: Went out to enjoy our jacuzzi,then relaxing in our jacuzzi and looking at the stars,it was mostly a clear night.Then my wife said to me look at that,is that a plane.I looked and watched it for atleast 2 minutes cross the sky in a stright line.I told my wife it's not a plane it's to low and very very bright white light,a plane whould have blinking lights,watching it cross the sky we were very carefull to watch it,we were in aww,the object went from south to north,then after it crossed the sky a plane we saw from the north flying south blinking,and i told my wife thats a plane,i know planes travel around 5to6 hundred miles per hour and feel the bright object was alittle faster at 7oo miles per hour,the bright star thing was bigger then the brightest star in the sky and much brighter.
content.summary: Very bright white looking star moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I once threw a stone and 20 houses fell and even the church over the gate was no more.

the gate still remains and what replaced the church is blatant in its name. 

enter as a thief and if you can solve the illusion the gate will open and you will be me. 

81st & lowell
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: I was stepping out my front door,(in orchards)vancouver,to smoke a cigarette.I always look up at the stars,my house faces south.To the right of me (west)i saw a large,dark orange glowing object.Coming into view.At first i thought it was fireworks or a flare.But it was moving very fast toward this direction.My son was in his room,he is almost 14,i yelled immediately for him to come out and look.It continued west,then slowed,and lights got dimmer and brighter,almost the color of the sun.It seemed round,and then slightly elongated,it seemed to hover,aproximately in the area south of p d x.Then it turned and headed south.This was 10:45 pm.We were very excited,my son was a little fearful,we watched,for a total of 4-5 minutes as it silently flew out of our sight.....Someone said,they thought it was the space station,i have seen that twice,and this i can say (from my experience)was not the space station.It was far too low in the sky,and too large,and looked like it was on fire,because of the color.Also,the radio,101.1 a caller reported a sighting in portland or.At 10:28 pm.When compared to the stars in the sky....It dwarfed them in size.The craft or object was silent.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orange/gold sun like in color.Silent,large salad plate in size from where i was.Light seemed to be glowing brighter and dimmer.
